/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX14.5.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/opengl_cpp.dir/src/_.cpp.o CMakeFiles/opengl_cpp.dir/src/main.cpp.o -o /Users/henrifox/opengl_code/opengl_cpp   -L/opt/homebrew/opt/glew/lib  -L/opt/homebrew/opt/glfw/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/opt/glew/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/opt/glfw/lib -lglfw -lglew -lOpenGL
